Package com.hexanome16.server.controllers.lobbyservice.gameservice

Class GameServiceController

java.lang.Object
com.hexanome16.server.controllers.lobbyservice.gameservice.GameServiceController
@Service public class GameServiceController extends Object
This controller is used for Game Service operations related to Lobby Service.

  • Method Details

    • createGameService

      @EventListener(org.springframework.boot.context.event.ApplicationReadyEvent.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> createGameService()
      This method registers this server as a game service in Lobby Service. It is called at the startup of the server.
      Returns:
      the response entity

    • deleteGameService

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteGameService()

      Returns:
      the response entity
